name: Theme-dev
tagline: Official repo of the Theme Dev framework
body:
### Welcome to the Theme-Dev Project
Theme-Dev is a WordPress theme framework built with Speed, Responsiveness and Search Engine Friendliness in mind.

[View Theme-Dev Live](http://theme-dev.com)

```
Speed
Responsiveness
Search Engine Friendliness
```

### Speed
Speed is optimized using a few different methods:

1. Entirely imageless layout
1. Lean, clean and optimized PHP
1. Reducing database look-ups

### Responsivemess

Theme-Dev has been built using a _mobile first_ approach. That means that, while we take full advantage of the larger viewports, mobile is never compromised. 

Javascript has been used to make a touch friendly _pull_ menu to use for navigation on small screens.

### Authors and Contributors

Currently this project is maintained entirely by @pattonwebz but I'd love to receive input from others.

### Support or Contact

Do you need to know more? Then visit the Theme-Dev website to see the framework live in action. You can contact me through GitHub or on the site if you have any questions :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
